settings_username_no_activity: Your account has not made any action on the platform, and is not registered in our store. Doing any type of interaction with the palteform will grant you the right to set a username.
settings_username_no_login_change: Changing this username will not change the username you use to login.
settings_username_preview_no_username: You have never changed your username. This is how other users see you.
settings_username_preview: This is how other users see you
settings_username_upload_error: An error occured while trying to upload new username
settings_companion_linked_to: Account is currently linked to Companion with ID
settings_companion_not_linked: Account is not linked to any Companion
settings_companion_upload_error: An error occured while trying to link Account to Companion. The code might be invalid
